title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about crying and praying in the rain

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain is one of the interpretations that many people search for. This vision is one of the visions that brings joy and happiness to the dreamer, because praying during the rain is one of the supplications that is answered. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rainPraying in the rain in a dream is one of the good visions that brings a lot of goodness to its owner and indicates that The dreamer hears news that makes him happy and that God will grant him the right to his long-awaited dreams. For a long time.Seeing the dreamer calling out to God and pleading with Him in the rain means that the dreamer is a religious person, and this vision is good news that his call will be received and that God will direct his steps and guide him. Way. If the dreamer is suffering from a deterioration in his health condition and sees that he is praying to God in the rain, then this is good news for a quick recovery and improvement of his health condition. Seeing begging in the rain symbolizes the dreamer’s changing circumstances and changes for the better. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrated Seeing praying in the rain in a dream is a good vision that contains a lot of goodness and abundance for the owner’s livelihood, whether professionally or socially. Seeing praying in the rain symbolizes the dreamer’s desire to achieve something or obtain something in his life and that God sent him this vision. To be a good sign that the time is approaching to achieve what he desires. Praying in the rain in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of a period in which he suffered a lot of problems and disagreements, and now is the time to change for the better and get rid of all the negative things that have disturbed his life. If the fortuneteller is applying for a job or intends to Entering into a new business project and seeing in his dream that he is beseeching God Almighty and asking him for success, this is a good sign that God will guide him and direct his steps towards it. The right way. Go to Google and type the dream interpretation site on the Internet and you will find all of Ibn Sirin’s interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain for a single womanPraying in the rain in a dream is one of the dreams that brings to its owner a lot of goodness, nourishment, and blessing, and it may be an indication of his relationship with a person who has a reliable scientific standing. Seeing unmarried women who are still in the stages of academic education walking in the rain is one of the good dreams that warns the dreamer to skip the current school stage and move to a higher stage with distinction that will dazzle those around her and he will be very happy with the success and success she has achieved. The single woman’s prayer as she walks in the rain and the suffering of distress Sadness is evidence that God will comfort her and relieve her of the sadness she is suffering and begin a new phase of life in which she will hear news that will make her very happy. If an unmarried woman commits some sins and follows a group of bad companions and sees that they are calling and begging God, then this is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to stay away from what he is and get closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the rain for a married woman. A married woman praying in the rain is one of the visions that carries a good interpretation and indicates the emergence of many positive things in the dreamer’s life, whether in terms of her relationship with her husband or her family relationship. The prayer of bitterness.

title: Interpretation of the dream of traveling to Egypt in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about traveling to Egypt in a dream, as a person’s travel in a dream is one of those visions that is constantly repeated in the sleep of many individuals. It is a dream that often appears after continuous thinking. Of course, such a vision includes a group of different interpretations, meanings, and connotations, whether good or bad, and messages to the dreamer, and in this article we present to you the interpretation of a dream about a trip to Egypt in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Egypt in a dream The fact that traveling to the country of Egypt in a dream includes a group It has a wide range of interpretations, meanings and connotations, as it varies depending on the viewer’s condition, including positive and good, some negative and non-negative. Good, and in the lines we explain the interpretation of the dream of traveling to Egypt in a dream is also: The dream of traveling to Egypt is a sign of family cohesion and comfort, and it also indicates a feeling of security. As well as seeing the person who traveled to Egypt. It is a sign that this person will achieve the goals that he wanted to achieve. Soon. Also, seeing Egypt in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will triumph over enemies. In addition to seeing traveling to Egypt in a dream. It indicates the end of many family problems and the stability of the family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bulbul in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream A trip to Egypt for a single woman. Although these interpretations are similar, they differ in their interpretations, and the reason for this is related to the state of the divine, whether social or psychological. Traveling to Egypt indicates that single people will have a wonderful diet and other indicators, and here we explain the interpretation of the dream of a trip to Egypt for a single woman. It is also: It is worth noting that seeing a trip to Egypt in one dream. It is a testimony to the feeling of security and stability in life for this girl. In the event that she wishes you This girl has many dreams and goals that she is pursuing. Visiting Egypt in a dream is a sign of the imminent fulfillment of all the girl’s dreams and desires. Also, if the girl is not engaged at the moment and is thinking about traveling to Egypt. He tells her that she will be associated with a young man who has many qualifications and good morals. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing potatoes in a dream. One of the most famous scholars of complete interpretation: Traveling to Egypt in a dream for a married woman. Also in the dream of a married woman, this vision includes many interpretations, meanings and connotations that are considered signs of goodness and happiness for her in married life. In this paragraph we will learn about the interpretation of travel. To Egypt in a dream for a married woman is also: Traveling in a dream for a married woman and her husband is a sign of the emotional and material stability in which this woman and her husband live. Also, seeing in a dream a married woman traveling to Egypt. It is a sign that she will get rid of the anguish and sadness that she experiences in her life. Also, if the viewer has problems at work or family environment with parents. Seeing her trip to Egypt in a dream is good news about the end of problems in her life. In addition to seeing a trip to Egypt in a dream. It is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of negative energy in his life,

title: Interpretation of a dream about a goat in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a goat in a dream about Al-Asamit Interpretation of a dream about a goat in a dream: It is evidence of ambitions and goals, especially if there is a mountain above it. As for seeing a dream about a goat on its way, this indicates wealth and many good things. A dream about a herd of goats indicates stability in marital life. Eating goat’s milk in a dream is an indication On the extensive diet that the dreamer will have. Interpretation of a dream about a goat in one dream. The dream of an unmarried girl indicates the good news that she is going through this period. Slaughtering a goat in a dream is a sign of marriage soon. Cooking a goat in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of goodness and livelihood. Which you receive, and evidence of getting rid of sins. Interpretation of a dream about a goat in a dream about a married woman. A goat in a married woman’s dream is evidence that you hear happy news, which is news of pregnancy. But if she sees in her dream that she is cooking a goat, this indicates the goodness that will prevail in the near future. Al-Osaimi stressed that slaughtering a goat in a married woman’s dream is repayment of debts and relief from distress. A married woman’s dream of seeing a small goat in a dream is an indication of achieving goals and dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a goat in a pregnant woman’s dream. Goats in a pregnant woman’s dream are a sign of easy childbirth. Goats In a dream, it also indicates good news. Interpretation of a dream about a goat for a man. Buying a goat in a dream is evidence of kindness. A goat in a dream indicates the benefits he obtains. A white goat indicates good visions that the dreamer experienced. Goat The black color in a dream shows the secret and stubbornness of the dreamer. A dream shows Searching for a goat represents the loneliness that the dreamer feels. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the social situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the heart in a dream: Heart rhythm disease in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of heart surgery, eating the heart of a red sheep, I dreamed that my heart stopped for the single, for the married, for the pregnant woman, by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the heart in a dream. The heart refers to the person who had the vision, his courage, his intelligence, his intelligence, his good intentions, and his ways. Likewise, the heart expresses the humility, compassion, and gentleness that he has Founder in his reality. It is said: Whoever sees in his dream the movement of the heart from its place until it comes out of its owner’s body, then the dream shows the safety and soundness of the faith of the owner of this heart in reality. And whoever sees in his dream that his heart is afflicted with panic and fear, then his vision shows guidance, knowledge of the path of truth, its conduct, and repentance. Which the owner of this heart presents in real life, so that he can be himself. He becomes one of the people of piety and justice. Whoever sees in his dream that his heart has become pieces after it was cut off, then this dream has two conditions. His heart was filled with love for God instead of love for people when he was awake. If the dreamer was afflicted with illness and diseases in reality, then the vision indicates recovery, healing, and safety from illness, anxiety, and distress, God willing. A man’s heart in a dream is a reference to his wife in reality, because she is the one who takes care of this man And take care of it in real life. Others have said that the heart is a reference to the official, master, or guardian who is responsible for the dreamer in reality, and the official or ruler who sees his heart in a dream, and then his vision shows his servants, guards, and soldiers charged with protecting his sovereignty and state. Seeing the heartbeat and its pulse indicates three things. For different occasions. The second case: If the dreamer wants to travel in reality, then his vision indicates his travel and movement from one country to another. As for the third case, it relates to the unmarried dreamer, whether a young man or a girl, and this vision indicates the marriage of the single person and his marriage soon, God willing, and the presence of Amer in his heart. If a person sees that his heart is black and black, the dream shows the sins and disobedience that this dreamer has sunk into in real life, and that he will die for them if he does not accept repentance and turn to God Almighty. The heart in a dream represents courage, security, reward, boldness, steadfastness, kindness, presence, generosity, and tolerance. And cruelty, morals, and customs. Whoever dreams that his heart comes out of his stomach in a dream, this indicates guidance and good religion. Whoever sees anxiety and pain in the heart in a dream shows repentance, and cutting the heart is evidence of the recovery of the sick person, and it may indicate piety, asceticism, and alleviation of worries. And seeing the eye in the heart indicates the recovery of the sick person. Integrity in religion. Whoever sees fear and terror in his heart shows guidance, truth, and reality. The beating of the heart indicates a retreat from something, or travel, or marriage, or temptation. A black heart shows many sins and bad attitudes. Pain in the heart indicates misconduct in matters of religion and indicates hypocrisy. And whoever sees his heart loses His vitality and activity. Interpretation of epileptic seizures in a dream. If you dream that you have seizures, this means that you will fall victim to ill health and lose your job. If you see others in a state of turmoil, this foretells that you will feel great discomfort due to the quarrels of those in your circle below you.Interpretation of the Heart YouTubeHeart Disease - YouTube

title: Interpretation of slaughtering a sheep in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of slaughtering a sheep in a dream and its meaning. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream is one of the dreams that may worry many people. However, it has many interpretations and interpretations that give good news to the dreamer, and they differ from one fortune teller to another based on the social position of the fortune teller. In the context of this article, we will learn in detail. Interpretation of seeing a slaughtered sheep in a dream. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream, especially since this dream differs in its interpretations and the connotations it contains, based on what is seen in the dream in many details, as it can be good news for the dreamer, and carries connotations of happiness and joy for him, and in this hadith we learn about Interpretation of the vision of slaughtering a sheep in a dream is also: If he sees in a dream a sheep slaughtered according to the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin and blood comes out of it. This dream is evidence of facilitation in the fortuneteller’s case. This vision is blood flowing from a sheep in a dream of being slaughtered. This dream is evidence of sadness and grief by God’s command. The Almighty is one of the fortune tellers. In addition to seeing the distribution of a load in a dream. It is evidence of joy, happiness, and happiness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, what the scholar Ibn Sirin saw is evidence of a certain thing happening to the dreamer that he fears will happen. See also: Interpretation of seeing our former house in a dream for single and pregnant women And married women slaughter a sheep in a dream for a married woman, as this vision includes a wide range of interpretations and explanations, as it differs from one viewer to another according to his social or psychological condition, and there are many dream interpretation scholars who were interested in clarifying the interpretations and meanings contained in these dreams, and in the course of the conversation we present to you an interpretation of the vision of slaughtering. A sheep in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman sees this dream in a dream. This vision is a sign of the cessation of fatigue and the end of all problems in this woman’s life. Likewise, if a married woman who has not given birth sees in a dream slaughtering a sheep. This dream is a sign of pregnancy and childbirth. And God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream of watching television for a single and married woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Slaughtering a sheep in a dream for single people. In the dream of an unmarried woman, this vision includes many interpretations, meanings and implications that could be good news for the dreamer, indicating the fulfillment of her desires in this life. In the context of this paragraph, we will explain to you the interpretation. Seeing the slaughter of a sheep in a dream for unmarried women also means: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is slaughtering a sheep, then she will be engaged. This dream is an indication of the approaching date of her wedding, and God knows best. Moreover, if an unmarried woman dreams of a slaughtered sheep, this is evidence of the death of distress and anxiety. It is near, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if an unmarried woman dreams that she slaughters him and flogs him at home. This vision is evidence that one of her family members will suffer from serious distress and will need her advice. Also, seeing a sheep slaughtered in an unmarried girl’s dream, and a lot of blood comes out of it. It is a sign On the good news that she will receive soon. Also, if an unmarried girl sees a sheep in a dream. It is a dream that indicates the goodness and justice that will exist in her life. Seeing the slaughter of a sheep is considered an unpleasant vision in life.

title: Interpretation of a thief in a dream without stealing anything

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a thief in a dream and its meaning in detail. Being robbed is in reality one of the most terrifying incidents, because sometimes the life of the one who is robbed is in danger with the threat of killing him if the thief does not get what he wants, and this incident raises fear, panic, and fear in the one who is exposed to it. On the one hand, Other, dreaming of a thief in a dream is an undesirable dream because it indicates that something bad will happen to the dreamer, but in reality this dream has many different interpretations that we will discuss for you in an encyclopedia.Interpretation of a thief in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a thief in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing a thief In general, it bodes well, because it may indicate the approach of trickery and the end of worries. If you see the thief entering the dreamer’s house, this vision indicates his recovery from illness if he falls ill in reality, and God knows best. Seeing a masked thief in a dream indicates the presence of an evil person in the life of the fortuneteller. He watches him closely and is jealous of what he has. In case you see someone close to you stealing the fortune teller, then this vision is a sign of gossip, gossip, and the presence of people speaking ill about the fortune teller. If someone sees someone stealing his sheep and cows, then this dream indicates that this thief is the main reason for the visionary’s journey. And God knows best. If the dreamer sees someone stealing his clothes, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will get married in reality and may indicate that he will get into trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream for a pregnant woman without stealing anything. If a pregnant woman sees a thief without him stealing anything from her, then this vision Evidence that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best, if this dream appears in the first months of pregnancy. Seeing a thief in a dream for a pregnant woman is accompanied by a feeling of anxiety and fear indicating the woman’s fear of giving birth. If a pregnant thief is killed in a dream, this vision indicates She will be exposed to many pregnancy problems in reality. Interpretation of a thief who sees an unmarried woman in a dream. As for an unmarried woman, seeing a thief in a dream indicates her relationship with an evil person who conspires and seeks to harm her. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a thief laughing, then this vision indicates The success of her romantic relationship in reality and an indication of her marriage soon, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that someone has stolen from her, then this vision indicates the presence of an evil person in her life who is trying to tarnish her reputation. If an unmarried woman sees a thief stealing gold, then this The vision indicates her marriage to a person of high status, and God knows best. Seeing a thief entering an unmarried woman’s house in a dream is a sign that problems will end in reality, and God knows best. Interpretation of a thief in a dream for a married woman: In the case of a married woman, seeing a thief in a dream is one of the visions. If a married woman sees a thief chasing her, this vision indicates the stability of her marital life and the end of her family problems. If she sees a thief falling in a married woman’s dream, this vision indicates many family problems and an increase in debts. Her husband. Seeing a woman

title: More than 50 interpretations of kissing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of kissing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the great commentators: Kisses are a way through which we express our love and feelings for the other party, and every person dreams of things that he needs in reality, and seeing kisses in a dream can mean that you are in dire need of the attention of those around you. You want them to appreciate your feelings, but you do not meet this need. Kiss in a dream Kissing in most cases is the best way to express the feeling of love towards others in our normal life. Kisses are a symbol of love. In a dream, kisses are a symbol that has different meanings. There are many interpretations that differ according to the viewer, and depending on who kisses him in the dream. It is possible to see yourself kissing a father or mother, or kissing someone you know or do not know, or kissing a child, or kissing animals, or kissing a dead person. The interpretation of a dream about kissing in a dream has more than Interpretation, according to the person you are kissing and what you feel while kissing in a dream, and in our article we will show you the interpretation of seeing yourself kissing in a dream. A kiss in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a kiss in a dream shows a person’s need to appreciate his feelings and give him love, attention and tenderness from others, He wants his children to express their love for him, even if he is a husband. He wants his wife to express her gratitude and love for him. If you see two or more people kissing in a dream, this means that you are interfering in the lives of others, monitoring their news, seeking to get to know them, and interfering in the affairs of others. Seeing the same man in a dream kissing his wife is a sign of his love for his wife In fact.Interpretation of a dream about kisses in a dream for a single woman: Visions and dreams sometimes bring us warnings. If an unmarried woman sees a monster kissing her in a dream, this warns her that a young man of bad morals and reputation will ask for her hand in marriage, so she should be careful and not accept every young man who approaches her except to ask. And it comes true in his life. If she sees a man kissing her in a dream but she does not know him, and this person is handsome, and she loves his features, and she is fascinated by him, then this indicates that she will earn a lot of lawful money and a lot of sustenance in the near future. If an unmarried woman has a disagreement with one of her friends At the university or at work, and she sees herself exchanging kisses with her, this indicates the nearness of their reconciliation and the collapse of the differences between them. A kiss in a dream on the cheek for a single woman. If a girl sees someone giving her a kiss on the cheek, this means that she will marry a man who is dissatisfied and does not love, but she will be forced to accept him. , but this may be at first but after a while. From engagement or marriage, you will love him and fall in love with him. It is said that a kiss on the cheek of an unmarried woman is a sign of the arrival of goodness, livelihood, advantages and profits. It is good news for any girl who sees someone kissing her cheek in a dream. Also, the interpretation of a kiss on the cheek in a dream for an unmarried woman is that a relative will give her advice that will benefit her in her life and in her future decisions. As for an unmarried girl who sees herself in a dream kissing... Cheek a person, it means that the girl will give him a benefit or fulfill a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about new clothes for a married woman

preview.html: It indicates freedom from crises and bad circumstances and shows the happiness that she experiences in her married life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing new clothes in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she sees a lot of new clothes, and wants to buy them, but her money is not enough. It indicates crises. The financial situation that this single woman will witness in her life. What if an unmarried girl sees new clothes in her home and she is happy? It announces the new things that she will see in her life, God willing, and she is happy. What if an unmarried woman buys new, spacious clothes for herself in a dream? Here It indicates her marriage to a good and righteous man, and he will protect her in her life. The same applies to a girl who sees that she is buying new clothes, but they are very tight. It indicates the difficult things that you will see, but you will get rid of them soon. See also: Interpretation of dreams about clothes on the floor. Interpretation of a vision New clothes in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she sees a lot of new clothes, but they are torn. The interpretation indicates undesirable things that this married woman will experience in her life. And a married woman sees in a dream that her husband gives her new clothes. This is a sign that she will get rid of Of all the problems that she goes through in her life, and God knows best. A married woman sees that she is looking for new clothes in many places and does not find them. It appears that there are annoying things that this woman will go through and that will make her very sad. Even though the married woman wears a lot of new clothes that are appropriate for her. This is an indication that there is good news that she will hear at this time, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing new clothes in a dream for a divorced woman, or seeing a divorced woman in a dream wearing new clothes, and this suits her well. As evidence of her close marriage to a good man, she will experience many good things. If the divorced woman wears new, torn clothes, this is an indication that there are sad things happening to this divorced woman in her life during this time. Seeing the divorced woman whose ex-husband gives her a lot of new clothes shows that she will get rid of all the problems she is experiencing with him and that she will return to him again. And the dreaming divorced person is looking for new clothes in a dream and does not find them. This indicates sad things and big problems that this divorced woman will face in her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about wearing new clothes for a married man. Interpretation of seeing new clothes in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is wearing a lot Of the new clothes that suit him. It indicates the good and beautiful life that accompanies him, and that he lives in peace during this period. If the dreamer buys new clothes but they are too tight for him in the dream. It indicates a material or moral crisis that this dreamer is experiencing in his life. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is sitting and choosing new clothes from his dressing room, it indicates the good and happy things that this dreamer will hear in his life. Although...

title: Interpretation of a dream about pasta

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a dream about pasta in a dream varies from one person to another, just as the interpretation of a dream about pasta in a dream differs from a man to a woman and from a single woman to a married woman or a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin is one of the imams of knowledge who interpreted many dreams other than Al-Nabulsi. It is important to emphasize, and you may also be interested in knowing more about lentils in a dream, as we always emphasize that dreams should not always be taken seriously, because it is possible that the dream is just thoughts wandering in the dreamer’s mind and has no value, so the dream can be a message or A warning message or dream, so dreams should not be a continuation of daily life. Interpretation of a dream about pasta in a dream by Ibn Sirin says that it is good news for sustenance and goodness in the life of the narrator. Interpretation of a dream about pasta in a dream for a pregnant woman shows that her due date is approaching and that it will be easy and that her newborn will be healthy. Interpretation Seeing pasta in a dream: Seeing pasta in a dream generally indicates food, goodness, and blessing. Interpretation of seeing a dream of pasta in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing the distribution of pasta dishes in a dream means that the dreamer will announce good news or experience happy events, and seeing large amounts of pasta in a dream means that The dreamer will earn a lot of money. Also, seeing pasta in a dream without cooking means that the dreamer is one of the hasty people when making decisions. As for eating colored pasta in a multi-colored dream, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money and that his financial situation will improve. Interpretation of seeing pasta In a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing an unmarried man in a dream buying pasta and cooking it indicates marriage to a woman with good morals. Just like the interpretation of seeing a dream about pasta in a dream, and the pasta has a little sauce, this indicates that the dreamer is facing a difficult problem. In his life, he feels embarrassed. If seeing pasta with red sauce, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money, but through illegal means. Also, seeing long pasta in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a healthy person and does not suffer from any disease. It also indicates longevity. Interpretation of seeing a dream of pasta in a dream for a married woman: To see pasta in a dream for a married woman eating pasta, this indicates the happiness she feels and it can also indicate saving a lot of money and it can also mean that the husband will get a good job opportunity or You will get the promotion at work. Also, if a married woman sees herself eating pasta with her husband on the same plate, this indicates the happy life she enjoys, full of joy and abundant nutrition. Seeing pasta in a single woman’s dreamSeeing pasta in a dream of an unmarried girl eating pasta indicates On the happiness that the girl will enjoy, especially if she shows signs of happiness while eating. Also, the interpretation of seeing a dream about pasta in...

title: What is the interpretation of watering plants in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Watering plants in a dream, agriculture is a basic art for the purpose of providing the necessary food to build the body of vegetables and fruits, and it is also one of the global professions that seek to provide animal and plant crops and achieve fruitful gains in trade. In this article, we will learn about the most important opinions and interpretations of scholars and jurists for this vision. Watering plants in a dream Scholars provide many positive interpretations that portend to the dreamer the interpretation of seeing plants watered in a dream, as we see as follows: The interpretation of a dream of watering green plants with water indicates a happy marriage. Whoever sees in his dream that he is watering the plants, this is evidence of his good deeds in the world and good news of a good ending in the future. Seeing crops watered in a married man’s dream indicates sustenance with righteous offspring. Seeing a dreamer watering a plant during his sleep is a sign of kindness and a lot of legitimate money. If a divorced woman sees that she is spraying plants with clean water in a dream, this is a sign of the end of worries and problems, getting rid of sadness, and the beginning of a new, happy life. Watering plants in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned many commendable meanings in the interpretation of a dream of watering plants, including: Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of a married man watering crops in a dream as good news about his wife’s immediate pregnancy and the birth of a just son. The interpretation of a dream of watering a seed S indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Sprinkling water in a dream is an indication of strength Faith, uprightness of religion, common sense, and correct Islamic doctrine. As for watering a lot of crops in a dream, it symbolizes the money that the dreamer saves to secure his future. Whoever sees that he is watering plants in his dream until they turn green, he spends his money and invests it in something useful. Watering plants in a dream for a single woman If a single woman sees in her dream that she is watering a dry plant, she feels lonely and emotionally empty. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a girl watering plants in her house is a sign of her imminent marriage. Seeing a girl watering green plants in her dream indicates purity, chastity, religiosity, fragrant behavior among people, and her high morals in dealing with others. Interpretation of a dream about watering dirt with water for a single woman The interpretation of a dream about watering dirt with water for a single woman indicates lawful food. Seeing a girl watering the soil with water in her dream means getting rid of sins and disobedience, getting closer to God, and wanting to obey Him. If the dreamer is sick and sees in her dream that she is pouring water on the ground, this is a sign of imminent recovery and the body recovering well. Watering plants in a dream for a woman Married The interpretation of a dream about watering plants in a married woman’s dream indicates sexual intercourse with her husband. If a dispute occurs between the dreamer and her husband, and she dreams that she is watering the crops in his dream, this is evidence of the end of the problems and the stability of their lives. Seeing her husband watering the crops in her dream means that he will get an important new position, increase his financial income and provide them with a decent life. Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing the wife watering the plants
